name: Žmurke (Hide and seek game)
description:
Ova igrica je posvećena mom sestriću Nikoli, nadam se da će ti se svideti.

Uputstvo:
Jedan igrač žmuri 10 sekundi dok ne čuje zvonce onda pokušava da nađe i uhvati drugog igrača.
Kontrole:
WSDA - Igrač 1 kretanje
Strelice - Igrač 2 kretanje
Esc - Izlazak iz igre

Instructions:
One player should wait 10 seconds without looking until a bell rings, and afterwards peruse to track and catch the other player.
WSDA -Player 1 movement
Arrow keys - Player 2 movement
Esc - Exit game

Big thanks to quaternius and Jaks for their lovely assets.
